mapper.select: select * from (select trim(cntrif) as cntrId, lncdif as lncd, ctszif as ctsz, cttyif as ctty, decode(crvsdrif, 'I', crvscdif || '/' || trim(crvsvyif) || '-' || crvsdrif, ' ') as imvsvy, decode(crvsdrif, 'E', crvscdif || '/' || trim(crvsvyif) || '-' || crvsdrif, ' ') as exvsvy, crvscdif as curvscd, crvsvyif as curvsvy, crvsdrif as curvsdr, intdif as intd, infeif as infe, inogif as inog, inthif as inth, inhzif as inhz, indmif as indm, decode(iydtif, 0, '', to_char(to_date(iydtif || lpad(iytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) as inYardDt, decode(oydtif, 0, '', to_char(to_date(oydtif || lpad(oytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) as outYardDt, decode(iyopcdif, 'IF', '进口重箱', 'IE', '进口空箱', 'RF', '公路进重箱', 'RE', '公路进空箱', 'LE', '装箱', 'LI', '拆箱') as inPortType, decode(crvsdrif, 'I', ptldif, 'E', ptdsif) as port, ceil(decode(oydtif, 0, sysdate, to_date(oydtif || lpad(oytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) - to_date(iydtif || lpad(iytmif, 6, '0'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss')) as storageDays, ctgwif as weight, decode(decode(crvsdrif, 'E', inotif), 'Y', 'Y', ' ') as loaded, caagif as caag from tcctifp where cntrif = rpad(#{cntrId},12,' ') order by iydtif desc, iytmif desc) a where rownum = 1
select ctpfim from custimp where vscdim = #{vscd} and vsvyim = #{vsvy} and vsdrim = #{vsdr} and trim(ctpfim||lpad(ctnrim,6,'0')||ctckim) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1
select ctpfcc from tcexccp where vscdcc = #{vscd} and vsvycc = #{vsvy} and trim(ctpfcc||lpad(ctnrcc,6,'0')||ctckcc) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1
select cablmf from tcblmfp where vscdmf = #{vscd} and vsvymf = #{vsvy} and vsdrmf = #{vsdr} and trim(ctpfmf||lpad(ctnrmf,6,'0')||ctckmf) = #{cntrId} and rownum = 1
